data.description:
Down the Rabbit Hole üêá üï≥Ô∏è is a VR adventure that takes place in Wonderland prior to Alice's arrival. You will discover a girl in search of her lost pet, Patches, who has wandered into Wonderland. Guide her as she moves through the mysterious world. But which way should she go?

{907736394605513}

# ‚ú® Welcome to a magical fairy tale set in Wonderland

You control the girl‚Äôs fate by plotting her journey through an immersive diorama that wraps around you. Through the game‚Äôs many twists and turns, you will find yourself exploring the most wondrous corners of Wonderland, solving puzzles, uncovering secrets and making choices about the story along the way.

# Features

changelog.change_log: Down the Rabbit Hole now supports 90Hz on Quest 2!!

90Hz support added for Quest 2!

1.01 Update: 
-Multiple save slots are now available.
-Subtitles for seven new languages have been added: Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Latin America), French (Canada).
-Puzzles that were written in English now use pictures.
-Many bug fixes.
